context: <user>  I need to find a eating place in San Carlos and some kind of Ramen food i okay <system>  There is a nice restaurant called Aya Sushi in San Carlos <user>  That is fine <system>  Is there any other help you need? <user>  Would you look for a salon in San Carlos? <system>  A salon called Sasha Salon in San Carlos is a nice one <user>  Can i know its average rating? <system>  The average rating of that is around 4.9<user>  That is fine <system>  You need an appointment there?<user>  Yes, i want an appointment to salon on 6th of this month <system>  What is your preferred time?<user>  I would like to have an appointment at 3:15 in the afternoon <system>  Please give confirmation details: An appointment with the hair stylist Sasha Salon at 3:15 pm on March 6th<user>  That is fine <system>  Sorry i failed in booking an appointment.
